title: Raja Raja Chozhan Naan Lyrics Rettai Vaal Kuruvi
stanzas: <div>Raja Raja Chozhan Naan Lyrics Rettai Vaal Kuruvi

Raja raja chozhan naan
enai aalum kadhal
dhesam neethaan.(2)
poove kadhal theeve

manmeedhu sorgam
vandhu pennaaga aanathe.
ullaasam boomi
ingu undaanathe.

Raja raja chozhan naan
enai aalum kadhal
dhesam neethaan
poove kadhal theeve.

Kannodu kangal yaetrum
karpoora deepame.
kai theendum podhu
paayum minsaarame.

ullaasam medai mele
oranga naadagam.
inbangal paadam sollum
en thaayagam.

ingangu oonjalaag
naan pogiren.
angangu aasai
theeyil naan vaegiren.

un raaga mohanam
en kadhal vaaganam.
sendhaamarai
sendhaen mazhai
en aavi neeye dhevi.

Raja raja chozhan naan
enai aalum kadhal
dhesam neethaan
poove kadhal theeve.

kalloora paarkkum paarvai
ulloora paayume.
thullaamal thullum ullam
sallaabamae.

villodu ambu rendu
kollaamal kolluthe
penpaavai kangal
endru poi solludhe.

mundhaanai moodum
raani selvaakkile.
en kadhal kangal
pogum pallaakkile.

thaen odai nerame
neeraadum nerame.
puzhaanguzhal
thallaadume ponmaeni
kaelaai raani.

Raja raja chozhan naan
enai aalum kadhal
dhesam neethaan
poove kadhal theeve.

aja raja chozhan naan
enai aalum kadhal

ingu undaanathe.
